SEARCH
Package Assets

Class Portfolio

java.lang.Object
Assets.Portfolio
public class Portfolio extends Object
Represents a user's portfolio of assets and provides functionality to add, edit, remove, and retrieve assets from persistent storage.

  • Constructor Summary

      public Portfolio()

  • Method Details

    • getOwner

      public UserData getOwner()
      Returns the owner (user) of the portfolio.
      Returns:
      the UserData object representing the owner.

    • addAsset

      public void addAsset(Asset asset)
      Adds an asset to the portfolio after validating it and saves it to the file.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset to be added.

    • editAsset

      public void editAsset(int assetID, Asset updatedAsset)
      Edits an existing asset identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      assetID - the ID of the asset to edit.
      updatedAsset - the new asset details to replace the old one.

    • removeAsset

      public void removeAsset(int assetID, String username)
      Removes an asset from the portfolio based on its ID and username.
      Parameters:
      assetID - the ID of the asset to be removed.
      username - the username of the asset's owner.

    • getAsset

      public Asset getAsset(int assetID, String username)
      Retrieves a specific asset by ID and username.
      Parameters:
      assetID - the ID of the asset.
      username - the username of the asset owner.
      Returns:
      the matching Asset or null if not found.

    • getAllAssets

      public List<Asset> getAllAssets()
      Returns a list of all assets stored in the portfolio.
      Returns:
      a list of all Asset instances.

    • getUserAssets

      public List<Asset> getUserAssets(String username)
      Returns a list of assets belonging to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to filter assets by.
      Returns:
      a list of Asset objects for that user.

    • getAvailableAssetTypes

      public List<AssetTypes> getAvailableAssetTypes()
      Returns a list of all available asset types.
      Returns:
      a list of AssetTypes enums.
